description.jp:
魔道士の国ミシディアの幼き白魔道士。
礼儀正しく落ち着いた少女で 
やんちゃな双子の弟パロムのお目付け役。
過去にバロン王の命令でミシディアを
襲ったセシルを監視すべく 彼に同行
していたが いつしか信頼感が芽生え 
監視役を終えた後も行動をともにした。
description.gl: A young white mage from Mysidia. Calm and polite、 she keeps her troublesome younger twin brother in line. She joined Cecil's party to keep an eye on him after he attacked Mysidia on the King of Baron's orders、 but became an ally after learning to trust him.

jp.text: ごらんのとおりですわ！
隠しててごめんなさい\nでもしかたなかったの
おごりたかぶってはいけないと\n長老がおっしゃってるでしょ！
お芝居するなら\nもう少し上手くやっていただきたいものね
お兄様ができたみたいで\nとっても嬉しかったですわ
私たちの魔力を送るわ！

gl.text: I'm terribly sorry I couldn't tell you.
How many times has our elder said you mustn't be so arrogant?
You would expect him to try a little harder to fool us、 wouldn't you?
It was almost like we'd gained an older brother.

rank_up_desc.jp:
「うそなき【C】」使用時
・BRV加算量小アップ
・「防御力ダウン」の効果小アップ
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
Inflicts [S Defense Down] to all enemies for 2 turns
Grants 1 stack of [Light Arts] for 6 turns (max is 3)

When [Light Arts] is at 3 stacks:
• Becomes [Cry+]
　∟ Inflicts [M Defense Down] to all enemies for 2 turns

[Light Arts] raises party Attack

All targets: 2 turns DEF Down I
Self: 6 turns 1 level of Light Arts (limit 3)
Becomes Cry+ with 3 levels of Light Arts

desc.en:
Slightly restores target's HP
Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, 200% of the excess is converted to BRV
Low Action Delay
Grants 1 stack of [Light Wisdom] for 4 turns (max is 3)

When [Light Wisdom] is at 3 stacks:
• Becomes [Mysidian Brilliance+]
　∟ Moderately restores target's HP
　∟ Grants [HP Damage Reduction] to target for 2 turns

[Light Wisdom] raises party Max BRV
desc.gl:
Slightly restores target's HP
200% of HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to target's BRV
High turn rate
Self: 4 turns 1 level of Light Wisdom (limit 3)
Becomes Mysidian Brilliance+ with 3 levels of Light Wisdom

対象のHPを小回復
対象の最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時
超えたHPの200％分 対象のBRVに加算
行動負荷が低い

desc.en:
When using 「White Wave」:
- Slightly raises BRV gained based on Max BRV
- Moderately raises Max BRV overflow limit of gained BRV
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

When 「Light Arts」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
  ∟ 2-HIT magic BRV attack
  ∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV

When 「Light Wisdom」 is active:
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
  ∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV before inflicting an HP attack
  ∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
  ∟ Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt
desc.gl:
When using White Wave:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be increased in excess of MAX BRV based on MAX BRV
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Light Arts active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)

While Light Wisdom active:
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before HP attack; increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120% based on MAX BRV)
